sentences.en: Children wriggle themselves when they are bored.
sentences.cn: 小孩子感到厌烦时就会扭动他们的身体.

sentences.en: Don't let Tom wriggle out of helping you.
sentences.cn: 不要让汤姆借故不帮你.

sentences.en: He always finds a way to wriggle out of punishment.
sentences.cn: 他总能想出办法逃避惩罚.

sentences.en: He clutched the child tightly as she again tried to wriggle free.
sentences.cn: 孩子一扭一扭地又想挣脱，他紧紧地抓住了她。

sentences.en: He felt her shoulders gave a wriggle of dissent.
sentences.cn: 他感到她的肩膀因为不同意而动了一下.

sentences.en: He felt her shoulders give a wriggle of dissent.
sentences.cn: 他觉出她的肩膀扭动一下,表示她的反对.

sentences.en: He is frightened and wants to wriggle out before he gets caught.
sentences.cn: 他害怕了,要想在被捉住之前逃走.

sentences.en: He tried to wriggle out of the sorrow.
His snakelike staff actually seemed to wriggle in sympathy.
sentences.cn: 他那根蛇状拐杖看上去似乎在扭动以示赞同.

sentences.en: I've got an appointment I can't wriggle out of.
sentences.cn: 我有个推脱不掉的约会.

sentences.en: Small children wriggle in their seats when they are bored.
sentences.cn: 小孩子们感到厌烦时,就会在座位上扭动.

sentences.en: Stop wriggling and let me put your T-shirt on.
sentences.cn: 别扭来扭去的，让我把T恤给你穿上。

sentences.en: The dog wriggled free and ran off.
There are many people who try to wriggle out of this.
sentences.cn: 许多人想要钻出这一困局.

sentences.en: They will very likely try to wriggle out of the armistice terms.
sentences.cn: 他们很可能设法拒不实施停战协定的条款.

sentences.en: You know you're to blame, so don't try to wriggle out of it.
sentences.cn: 你知道你要负责任, 别想蒙混过去.

words.tran_cn: 使蠕动；蠕动到；不知不觉地潜入

trans.tran_en: a movement in which you twist your body from side to side
to twist your body from side to side with small quick movements

trans.tran_cn: 扭动，蠕动，蜿蜒行进，摆脱，用计逃脱
（使身体某一部位）扭动，耍滑不做，逃避（应做的事等）
